# Gold Award for Best Actor in a Lead Role

| image_upright  =
| caption        = The 2019 recipients: Dheeraj Dhoopar and Mohsin Khan
| awarded_for    = Best Performance by a Male Actor in a Lead Role on Television
| presenter      = White Leaf Entertainment
| country        = India
| year           = 2007
| holder         =
* Dheeraj Dhoopar for Kundali Bhagya
* Mohsin Khan for Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
| website        = [https://www.goldawards.in/ Gold Awards]
}}
Gold Award for Best Actor in a Lead Role Male is an award given as part of its annual Gold Awards to recognise a male actor who has delivered an outstanding performance in a leading role on Hindi television. The award is voted for by the fans.
